briefTitle: Efficacy Study Of Tofacitinib In Pediatric JIA Population
officialTitle: EFFICACY, SAFETY AND TOLERABILITY OF TOFACITINIB FOR TREATMENT OF POLYARTICULAR COURSE JUVENILE IDIOPATHIC ARTHRITIS (JIA) IN CHILDREN AND ADOLESCENT SUBJECTS

interventions.name: CP-690,550 (tofacitinib)
otherNames: Matching placebo to tofacitinib (same tablet or solution as the active arm).

summary: Evaluate efficacy, safety and tolerability of tofacitinib in pediatric JIA patients.

primaryOutcome.measure: Double Blind Phase: Percentage of Participants With Disease Flare According to Pediatric Rheumatology Collaborative Study Group/Pediatric Rheumatology International Trials Organization (PRCSG/PRINTO) Disease Flare Criteria at Week 44
